title: 18 Top Brutalist UI Design Examples
short: Some awesome examples of Brutalism in UI for your design inspiration!
body: Brutalism as a design methodology stands in direct contrast with more 'highly polished' solutions. It's often called the 'raw concrete' of the web, with its unconventional, unrefined & raw aesthetic that evokes strong feelings of nostalgia. So let's take a peek at 18 Brutalist UI Design Examples! ## [Online Book Store - Concept by Johann Schnettker](https://dribbble.com/shots/10795572-Online-Book-Store-Concept) ## [Brutalist Clothes Sale by Ciarán Dold](https://dribbble.com/shots/5500334-Brutalist-Clothes-Sale) ## [NEW SITE, WHO DIS?? by Zach Halfhill](https://dribbble.com/shots/2846676-NEW-SITE-WHO-DIS) ## [Portfolio website by Victoria](https://dribbble.com/shots/10016617-Portfolio-website) ## [My Portfolio by Anna Aloshyna](https://dribbble.com/shots/4997184-My-Portfolio) ## [Plumage web design mock up by Markela Bgiala](https://dribbble.com/shots/8585562-Plumage-web-design-mock-up) ## [Brutalist Website by Victor Belinatti](https://dribbble.com/shots/4628422-Brutalist-Website) ## [F.A.Q. – Day 92 #DailyUI by Patryk Kalwas](https://dribbble.com/shots/3996992-F-A-Q-Day-92-DailyUI) ## [brutalist happiness by Tomasz Zastawny](https://dribbble.com/shots/4033409-brutalist-happiness) ## [36 Days Of Type - Day 5 by Johann Schnettker](https://dribbble.com/shots/10678782-36-Days-Of-Type-Day-5) ## [Brutalist Portfolio by Svetlana Radenkovic](https://dribbble.com/shots/9193037-Brutalist-Portfolio) ## [My Yought Yugoslavia by Antonio Stojceski](https://dribbble.com/shots/9148586-My-Yought-Yugoslavia) ## [Boom Festival - Single event by Vukasin Stancevic](https://dribbble.com/shots/8160105-Boom-Festival-Single-event) ## [Neon City by Davide Baratta](https://dribbble.com/shots/10805868-Neon-City) ## [Weedmore layout by Michał Rome](https://dribbble.com/shots/10032305-Weedmore-layout) ## [Mono Ecommerce Mobile Website by tubik](https://dribbble.com/shots/8935644-Mono-Ecommerce-Mobile-Website) ## [Mutant Radio by Giga Tamarashvili](https://dribbble.com/shots/11260388-Mutant-Radio) ## [RESET by Davide Baratta](https://dribbble.com/shots/10825084-RESET) ## Related Posts: * [25 Top Neumorphism UI Design Examples](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-03-27-25-top-neumorphism-ui-design-examples) * [15 Neumorphism UI Code Examples](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-09-15-neumorphism-ui-code-examples) * [25 Dark Mode UI Design Examples](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-05-13-25-dark-mode-ui-design-examples)
